snippet: The Bay Area and Silicon Valley expect the windfall from the Facebook stock offering to make their in-demand region even hotter.
abstract: Realtors in the Bay Area and Silicon Valley expect the windfall from the Facebook stock offering to increase housing prices in the already-desirable area; stock offering is expected to create a legion of newly-minted millionaires, many of whom are likely to seek new homes.
lead_paragraph: The Bay Area and Silicon Valley expect the windfall from the Facebook stock offering to make their in-demand region even hotter.

headline.seo: California Housing Market Braces for Facebook Millionaires
headline.main: If Silicon Valley Costs a Lot Now, Wait Until the Facebook Update
headline.print_headline: If Silicon Valley Costs a Lot Now, Wait Until the Facebook Update
